attributes.action: protect eu victims of property fraud
attributes.additional_details:
Petition to put pressure on other eu countries to stop property fraud and double selling off property many people in the UK have fallen prey to this and have lost their lives savings to these property scams.
Bulgaria seems to be the worst country for the scam and the government still has not done anything about this despite 2 high level cases hitting the media we must act now to stop more people from losing their money to this type off scam
The only way that we will get justice is for all of us to act together and finally put a stop to this form of fraud by some unscrupulous so called property agents in Bulgaria.
